categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Dayja was a male Human who worked as an agent for Imperial Intelligence of the Galactic Empire. He worked with d'Ashewl to spy on the Imperial Court, and with the bounty hunter Boba Fett in his disguise as the smuggler Eanjer Kunarazti to finish his mission to hunt a Vigo of the Black Sun, the Falleen Qazadi.
